segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching up towards that "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, clearly grabbing handfuls of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the other hand, he's holding a plate, maybe to catch the falling crumbs or serve as a lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, looking up at him with such eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, practically begging for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this little conspiracy, completely focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable, in a mischievous way, how determined they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine him tumbling down with a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much risk children will take for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is a recipe for disaster and delight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely unaware of the overflowing sink just behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR
